text: Zakir Hussain is a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Bharatiya Janata Party representing the Nuh (city) Vidhan sabha Constituency in Haryana. ==Family== Hussain's grandfather Mohammad Yaseen Khan was a member of the Punjab Legislative Assembly in 1926, Hussain's father Choudhary Tayyab Husain was a Minister in the undivided state of Punjab, Rajasthan and Haryana. === Early life === === Career === === Distinctions and records === === Personal life === == References == Category:Living people Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Indian National Lok Dal politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana Category:People from Gurgaon Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Zakir Hussain (Haryana politician)
